verses.kjv: Come near, ye nations, to hear; and hearken, ye people: let the earth hear, and all that is therein; the world, and all things that come forth of it.
verses.ct: Come close, all nations, and listen; pay attention, all peoples. Let the earth hear this, and everything in it — the whole world and all that it produces.

verses.kjv: For the indignation of the LORD is upon all nations, and his fury upon all their armies: he hath utterly destroyed them, he hath delivered them to the slaughter.
verses.ct: The LORD's rage is directed at every nation, and his fury is against all their armies. He has marked them for total destruction; he has handed them over to be slaughtered.

verses.kjv: Their slain also shall be cast out, and their stink shall come up out of their carcases, and the mountains shall be melted with their blood.
verses.ct: Their dead will be thrown out unburied, the stench will rise from their corpses, and the mountains will be drenched with their blood.

verses.kjv: And all the host of heaven shall be dissolved, and the heavens shall be rolled together as a scroll: and all their host shall fall down, as the leaf falleth off from the vine, and as a falling fig from the fig tree.
verses.ct: All the stars of heaven will dissolve, and the heavens will be rolled up like a scroll. All their stars will wither and fall like leaves dropping from a vine, like shriveled figs falling from a fig tree.

verses.kjv: For my sword shall be bathed in heaven: behold, it shall come down upon Idumea, and upon the people of my curse, to judgment.
verses.ct: "My sword has been prepared in heaven; look — it will come down on Edom, on the people I have condemned, to carry out judgment."

verses.kjv: The sword of the LORD is filled with blood, it is made fat with fatness, and with the blood of lambs and goats, with the fat of the kidneys of rams: for the LORD hath a sacrifice in Bozrah, and a great slaughter in the land of Idumea.
verses.ct: The LORD's sword is drenched in blood, coated with fat — the blood of lambs and goats, the fat from the kidneys of rams. Because the LORD has a sacrifice to make in Bozrah, a massive slaughter in the land of Edom.

verses.kjv: And the unicorns shall come down with them, and the bullocks with the bulls; and their land shall be soaked with blood, and their dust made fat with fatness.
verses.ct: Wild oxen will fall alongside them, and young bulls with the mighty ones. Their land will be soaked with blood, and their soil will be saturated with fat.

verses.kjv: For it is the day of the LORD’s vengeance, and the year of recompences for the controversy of Zion.
verses.ct: This is the day of the LORD's vengeance, the year of payback for the cause of Zion.

verses.kjv: And the streams thereof shall be turned into pitch, and the dust thereof into brimstone, and the land thereof shall become burning pitch.
verses.ct: Edom's rivers will turn to tar, its soil will become sulfur, and its land will become blazing tar.

verses.kjv: It shall not be quenched night nor day; the smoke thereof shall go up for ever: from generation to generation it shall lie waste; none shall pass through it for ever and ever.
verses.ct: It will burn without stopping, day and night; its smoke will rise forever. Generation after generation it will remain desolate; no one will ever travel through it again.

verses.kjv: But the cormorant and the bittern shall possess it; the owl also and the raven shall dwell in it: and he shall stretch out upon it the line of confusion, and the stones of emptiness.
verses.ct: Instead, pelicans and hedgehogs will take it over; owls and ravens will live there. God will stretch over it the measuring line of chaos and the plumb line of emptiness.

verses.kjv: They shall call the nobles thereof to the kingdom, but none shall be there, and all her princes shall be nothing.
verses.ct: Its nobles will have no kingdom left to proclaim, and all its princes will come to nothing.

verses.kjv: And thorns shall come up in her palaces, nettles and brambles in the fortresses thereof: and it shall be an habitation of dragons, and a court for owls.
verses.ct: Thorns will overtake its palaces, weeds and thistles will fill its fortresses. It will become a home for jackals, a dwelling place for ostriches.

verses.kjv: The wild beasts of the desert shall also meet with the wild beasts of the island, and the satyr shall cry to his fellow; the screech owl also shall rest there, and find for herself a place of rest.
verses.ct: Desert creatures will encounter wild animals there, and wild goats will call out to each other. Night creatures will also settle there and find themselves a resting place.

verses.kjv: There shall the great owl make her nest, and lay, and hatch, and gather under her shadow: there shall the vultures also be gathered, every one with her mate.
verses.ct: Owls will nest there, laying and hatching their eggs, sheltering their young under their wings. Vultures too will gather there, each one paired with its mate.

verses.kjv: Seek ye out of the book of the LORD, and read: no one of these shall fail, none shall want her mate: for my mouth it hath commanded, and his spirit it hath gathered them.
verses.ct: Search through the book of the LORD and read it: not one of these creatures will be missing, and none will lack a mate. Because the LORD's own mouth has given the command, and his spirit has brought them together.

verses.kjv: And he hath cast the lot for them, and his hand hath divided it unto them by line: they shall possess it for ever, from generation to generation shall they dwell therein.
verses.ct: He himself has assigned their portions and measured out the land for them. They will possess it forever; they will inhabit it generation after generation.
